title: Cold Weather Cattle Management Webinar - March 12 2019

tasks.task: Presenting webinar speakers and managing cattle during winter.
subtasks: Explain body condition scoring for cows and bulls.
Discuss the importance of semen quality in bulls.
Address scrotal frostbite in bulls and its effects.
Review cues for recognizing cold-stressed calves.
Detail intervention methods for chilled calves.
Evaluate winter hay feeding strategies and supplement alternatives.
Assess pasture and range conditions for spring turnout.
Address cattle nutrition and energy requirements during cold weather.
Provide feedback on webinar technology and host closing remarks.
